hero.title: AG1: How to increase average check in Health Nutrition by subscription

stats.description: to average check on repeat purchase

items.value: Brand and website update, advertising landing page builder, personal account on Shopify, CRM, admin panel for order management, 3 design systems
items.label: what I did

items.value: Shopify, Figma, Design systems, Autolayouts, Tokens, Variables, iOS guidelines, Animations, A/B testing, Edge cases
items.label: stack

sections.text: AG1 is a daily nutrient complex in subscription format. A person receives a set once a month that covers basic needs for vitamins, minerals and adaptogens. No complex schemes: one product, simple ritual and stable result

Subscription is the heart of business. To make it work better, it's important to conveniently change order, subscription settings, control deliveries and understand benefits. My task is to simplify these processes, make funnel and interface effective, and along with this increase average check and LTV

blocks.text:
AG1 was growing, but faced a typical problem of subscription services: users rarely changed plan, didn't buy additional products and almost didn't interact with personal account.

Reasons were simple: necessary functions were deeply hidden, benefits between plans were unclear, and interface didn't help make decision. As a result, average check for repeat purchase remained noticeably below expected.

Main tasks I took on:
Increase average check on repeat purchase (goal — +18.2%).
Increase LTV (goal — +6.2%).
Simplify subscription management path.
Do all this carefully, without aggressive pressure on user.

blocks.subtitle: Understood how people behave in product
blocks.text: Analyzed clicks, scrolls, scenarios. Found out where users slow down, what they don't find and which options they ignore.

blocks.subtitle: Rebuilt subscription page structure
blocks.text:
Made plan options and additional products more noticeable. Highlighted savings and choice logic.
Reduced number of steps, made process visually clearer.

blocks.subtitle: Added soft and honest upsell
Updated personal account and admin panel
blocks.text:
Simplified scenarios for changing delivery date, number of packages, order composition.
Made product cards and modal windows clearer.

blocks.subtitle: Tested hypotheses
blocks.text: Launched A/B tests, collected data, refined text hints, buttons and visual accents.

+18.2% to average check on repeat purchase.
+6.2% to LTV thanks to improved subscription work.
People became more active in changing plan and adding products.
Fewer questions to support — interface became simpler and clearer.
Personal account came alive: activity increased approximately 1.7 times.

blocks.quote: We now have an amazing design system
blocks.author: Nick Bouse, Design Director AG1
